title: Chaco Culture National Historical Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Condition of South Road (Hwy 57)  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Condition of South Road (Hwy 57)  Be advised, due to heavy rains, Hwy 57 is considered impassible. Travel at your own risk or arrive at the park via County Road 7950 from Hwy 550.
